System requirements:

Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent

Description: 1989 year. Your name is Henry, and you left a difficult life in the forests of Wyoming to work there as a watchman. Located at the very top of the mountain, you must monitor the safety of the surrounding nature. A particularly hot, dry summer makes everyone worried. Your boss, a woman named Delilah, always keeps in touch with you with a small hand-held radio-the only connection with the world you left behind. But when something strange forces you to leave your post and go into the forest, you begin to explore the unfamiliar world around, ask questions and make decisions that can both strengthen and destroy the only important relationships at the moment. Firewatch is a game about adult people leading adult conversations on adult topics. If you plan to play it with a young gamer, take this into account.
